value:
$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Your turn, Thórr.$k$pHave you chosen your Forma?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Still mulling it over? Hee-hee...
I just love seeing your face twisted
into a scowl.$k$pJust think... How embarrassing it
would be for the god of war to
lose this, of all games!$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Stop distracting me, Loki. Are you
incapable of shutting that mouth
for even a moment?$k$pI have chosen. These Forma are
unneeded. Show me more.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|As you request... Here are some
others. Which will you choose?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Seeing you struggle is so delicious!
Tell me... Does this game not suit a
world that dances to my tune?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|I have my own duties to attend to,
Loki. I do not have time to play
your game...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|No, no, no...  You won't be leaving
until you've won. You promised!$k$p$EFace_Cool|We who will never die have all the
time there is! Why, we can play until
we go mad!$k$p$EFace_Smile|So... What's your next move?$k$p
